title: In case of incoming call, not able to open any app without accepting or rejecting the call.
content:
During incoming call, there is only 3 action that can be performed:
Accept
Decline
Send a template as message
While already using an app, if a call comes, the attached screen overlays over it. There is no way to keep using the app without declining/accepting the call.
Even not able to swipe up from the dash at the bottom of the screen.
I want to move the incoming call screen to background.
Is there any settings that can allows me to keep using the apps without accepting or declining the call. This feature is present in other devices.
